note:
The German Institute on Radicalization and De-Radicalization Studies (GIRDS) is a non-profit network of scholars and practitioners dedicated to preventing and countering violent extremism (P/CVE) and terrorism. We share research, practitioner experiences and news related to developments withn violent extremism and terrorism in Germany and around the world.

Homepage: www.girds.org
Twitter: @GIRD_S
FB: www.facebook.com/radicalisation
Founding Director: Dr. Daniel Koehler
